item.description:
Hello all,

The January Meetup is the regular (unhosted) informal conversation group meeting, at Starbuck's in the Back Bay.

Please print and bring a Meetup sign from the column on the left (click on Files or Promote, I think) so that you can recognize each other more easily!

There are usually seats open at the large table near the front, or you can pull some smaller tables together. Please introduce yourselves and feel free to ask for help from each other. It is usually helpful if everyone starts with one conversation partner and then changes partners after 15 or 20 minutes!

Although I had hoped to come to this meeting myself, I may be away with a family issue unfortunately, so in case I don't see you this time, have fun!
item.how_to_find_us: print a sign and bring it so you can meet each other!

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language January Meetup
